Changelog

Here's the recent changes to Better Timeit.

.. changelog::
    :version: 1.0.1
    :released: 2014-04-29

    .. change::
        :tags: general

        A version that actually works: the 1.0 release didn't extract the body
        of the timeit function.

        First version.
